Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class LightLocalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightLocalization
  • public class LightLocalization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will provide methods to perform odometer correction using light sensors which are sampled by the LightSensorPoller thread. In order to correct the robot’s position, this class will provide methods to localize at different waypoints using two light sensors. The odoCorrectionFirst method corrects the robots' position along the y-axis. The odoCorrectionSecond method corrects the robots’ position along the x-axis

        public void singleLineCorrection​(double turnBy)
        Light sensor correction along a single line used before and after the tunnel to ensure straight line travel through said tunnel. Uses static methods from NavigatorUtility class
        Parameters:
        turnBy - initial angle to turn by to align axle along the line that we want to correct with
